text: وَأَنَّ ٱلۡمَسَٰجِدَ لِلَّهِ فَلَا تَدۡعُواْ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدٗا
translation: (18) And [He revealed] that the masjids[1772] are for Allāh, so do not invoke[1773] with Allāh anyone.
footnotes:
[1772]- The term "masjid" here includes every place of worship or the earth in general.
[1773]- Or "worship."
